name: @kawaz/create-worker
description: Create Web Workers from inline functions without requiring separate worker files.
author: kawaz

scripts.test:playwright: bunx playwright install --with-deps && bunx playwright test
scripts.lint: bun exec 'if [[ -z $CI ]]; then bun run lint:fix; else bun run lint:ci; fi'
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun exec 'rm -rf lib dist' && bun run lint && bun run build && bun run build:types && bun run test && bun run test:playwright && bun run coverage
